name: NBA Engine
postCreateCommand: bash -c "curl -Ls https://micro.mamba.pm/api/micromamba/linux-64/latest | tar -xvJ -C /usr/local/bin --strip-components=1 bin/micromamba && micromamba shell init -s bash -y && micromamba create -y -f env.yml -n nba-engine && echo 'micromamba activate nba-engine' >> ~/.bashrc"
